name: Escape! (itch) (kkrac)
description:
Escape is an arcade game made for LowRezJam 2020.

  • Use your mouse to guide your character through enemies.
  • The more time it goes by, the faster time moves.
  • Make enemies collide between each other to add to your score and drop some power-ups:
    •  Hearts replenish your life
    • Clocks slow down gameplay

Credits
Music from freesound.org
Sound from Zapsplat.com
